title: Prediction of future dementia among patients with mild cognitive impairment (MCI) by integrating multimodal clinical data
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Andrew Cirincione, Kirsten Lynch, Jamie Bennett, Jeiran Choupan, Bino Varghese, Nasim Sheikh-Bahaei, Gaurav Pandey, for the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative
